Label: CAP binding site
note: CAP binding activates transcription in the presence of cAMP.

Label: lac promoter
note: promoter for the E. coli lac operon

Label: lac operator
note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

Label: M13 rev
note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants

Label: M13 Reverse
note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-rev

Label: M13 Forward
note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-F20 or M13 (-21) Forward

Label: M13 fwd
note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants

Label: pRS-marker
note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker

Label: pBRforEco
note: pBR322 vectors, upsteam of EcoRI site, forward primer

Label: AmpR
note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
